definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile

sentences.english: When finished with the list, click OK then close out of Local Group Policy Editor.
sentences.chinese: 完成列表后，点击确定并关闭本地组策略编辑器。

sentences.english: A typical example would be colors used for syntax highlighting with an editor.
sentences.chinese: 一个典型示例是用颜色来突出显示编辑器中的语法。

sentences.english: Fixed not being able to escape from map editor menus after applying options.
sentences.chinese: 固定不能够逃脱地图编辑器菜单后应用选项。

sentences.english: The main option I focus on in this article is the inline editor switch.
sentences.chinese: 本文将重点讲述的主要选项是行内编辑器开关。

sentences.english: If not, it provides error reporting through annotations.
sentences.chinese: 如果不适合，编辑器通过注释来提供错误报告。

sentences.english: Provide an overview about the world editor.
sentences.chinese: 提供一个涉及世界编辑器的概说。

sentences.english: The editor contains a button that will perform the submission.
sentences.chinese: 该编辑器包含一个将执行提交的按钮。

sentences.english: Basic information about using macros to automate tasks in the editor.
sentences.chinese: 关于在编辑器中使用巨集来自动化工作的基本资讯。

sentences.english: This text editor software is actually still in use.
sentences.chinese: 这个文字编辑器的软件实际上依然还在使用中。

sentences.english: Save the dependency editor, and then close it.
sentences.chinese: 保存依赖关系编辑器，然后关闭它。

sentences.english: Open the test in the test editor.
sentences.chinese: 在测试编辑器中打开测试。

sentences.english: In the code editor, create an event-handling method with the appropriate signature.
sentences.chinese: 在程式码编辑器中，以适当的签章建立事件处理方法。

sentences.english: Use an external editor to compose plain-text mail messages.
sentences.chinese: 一个使用外部编辑器编写纯文本信息的插件。

sentences.english: Sending invitations is not limited to the team or project area editors.
sentences.chinese: 发送邀请并不仅限于团队或项目区域编辑器。

sentences.english: The list of variables in the business state machine or process editor contains global variables.
sentences.chinese: 业务状态机或流程编辑器中的清单列表包含全局变量。

definition: plug-in (software or hardware)/to plug in a component
a control (e.g. button, text box etc) (computing)
my (Internet slang variant of 我的[wo3 de5])
